Oh God . Grant me forgiveness for whatever ( sins ) which I did earlier and the later, which I will hide and that I seem at least as well as whatever act or extreme vanity which I do thou any more to know about it from my own . You are mighty before God and the almighty end . There is no God but Thee alone.O Allah! I seek refuge with you from the punishment in the grave and from the punishment in the Hell fire and from the afflictions of life and death, and the afflictions of Al-Masih Ad-Dajjal.
